short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a priority list of twitch streams and watch indefinitely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamless twitch.tv stream switcher; always have something playing in the background!

Features:
Gets your followed channels automatically, you just have to be logged in to twitch.tv
Arrange stream priorities in settings
Play, pause, next, previous controls
Automatically detects when stream ends or streamer starts hosting another stream, opens next one

This is an open-source extension and the code can be found here: https://github.com/darksworm/infitwitch
